about_the_game:
This is a round based strategy cultivation game,

After entering the game, players will automatically have a basic city after selecting a basic monarch role. In the city, you can build various buildings and practice magic. Recruit people to buy horses and farm. After passing the novice period according to the novice task, you can recruit powerful immortals to fight in the dungeon to obtain powerful rewards, so as to improve your strength. When your strength continues to improve, you can obtain higher positions and more powerful resources. Respect the strong in the world of cultivating immortals, and enter the world of cultivating immortals!

The game is retro style, simple to operate and easy to use. It may also be the only game that can not occupy the players' real time so as to achieve the goal of leisure and relaxation. If you need, you can not participate in online content, but only cultivate immortals by yourself.

The basic background of the game borrows some of the settings of the novel Star Change, while the story line borrows the world view of the Three Kingdoms and the world view of the Legend of the Swordsman 3-4.

In the later stage of the game, you can escape from the world and fight in other worlds with various playing methods.

The previous version can only use external tools to brush the copy, but the current version has updated the automatic mountain brushing. When players crush the copy, they can automatically brush the mountain with one key to reduce the burden on players.
After you purchase this game, please contact the customer service through the prompt on the official website to obtain the game account and password. This game can be cleared without additional recharge.
